author: vjmastra
body:
#### PR description:

Update DQM and RelVal code for BPH Trigger plots to take into account new triggers (eg inclusive dimuon trigger HLT_DoubleMuon4_3_LowMass_v), few changes in path names and cleaning of empty plots

Short report in STEAM meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1180797/#17-b-physics-quarkonia-pag

#### PR validation:

Code has been tested following [twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/HLTValidationAndDQM#CMSSW_12_4_X_on_Run3_MC) in CMSSW 12_6_0_pre3 on a BuMixing RelVal [file](https://cmsweb.cern.ch/das/request?input=file%3D%2Fstore%2Frelval%2FCMSSW_12_6_0_pre2%2FRelValBuMixing_14%2FGEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW%2F125X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v3-v1%2F2580000%2F0a16f6be-0412-493b-b8ee-ca62d9e6da98.root&instance=prod/global) 

Output file: /afs/cern.ch/user/v/vmastrap/public/bph-dqm-12_6_0_pre3/DQM_V0001_R000000001__Global__CMSSW_X_Y_Z__RECO.root

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This should be backported to 12_4_X for the data taking (if possible)
title: Update and cleaning of BPH trigger DQM/RelVal plots
